channel.title: About on Yu Yamashita
channel.description: Recent content in About on Yu Yamashita

item.title: About
item.description: About Me Hi, I’m Yu Yamashita! I’m an undergraduate student at the University of Tsukuba, where I’m part of the FusionCompLab. I’m a doing research internship at Max Planck Institute from April 2023! Education The University of Tsukuba, Japan B.S. in Library and Information Science, Apr. 2018 - Mar. 2023 Advisor: Atsuyuki Morishima Research Interests Human-AI interaction, Crowdsourcing, Machine Learning Publications Yunyi Xiao, Yu Yamashita, Hiroyoshi Ito, Masaki Matsubara, Atsuyuki Morishima.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email: yu.yamashita.03@gmail.com Mailing Address University of Tsukuba 221B, Baker Street London United Kingdom -- Social Github Linkdin
